meanings.definition: A person who participates in a multiplayer game.
meanings.sent1: The multiplayers gathered online to compete in the game.
meanings.sent2: In the tournament, many multiplayers showed their skills.
meanings.sent3: The multiplayers in the game formed a team and strategized together.
meanings.sent4: She stood out among the multiplayers like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The group of multiplayers cheered each other on to victory.

meanings.definition: A feature of a game that allows multiple players to participate simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The game's multiplayers option enabled friends to play together.
meanings.sent2: The multiplayers mode was popular among gaming enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The multiplayers feature made the game more exciting and interactive.
meanings.sent4: The multiplayers function brought a new level of competition to the game.
meanings.sent5: With the multiplayers capability, players could join forces to overcome challenges.
